giải nghĩa từ "adjectives" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

### Adjectives

| Adjectives | Meaning | Example | Related words | Antonyms |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1. Adventurous | Daring, willing to take risks | "He's an adventurous person who loves to travel." | Brave, bold, fearless | Cautious, timid |
| 2. Ambitious | Having a strong desire to succeed | "She's an ambitious entrepreneur who wants to start her own business." | Determined, driven, motivated | Lazy, unenthusiastic |
| 3. Ancient | Very old, from a long time ago | "The ancient city was discovered in the desert." | Old, historic, venerable | Modern, new |
| 4. Beautiful | Pleasing to the eye or ear | "The beautiful sunset on the beach was breathtaking." | Lovely, attractive, stunning | Ugly, unattractive |
| 5. Boring | Not interesting or exciting | "The boring lecture put me to sleep." | Dull, tedious, monotonous | Exciting, thrilling |
| 6. Brave | Showing courage or strength | "The brave firefighter saved the child from the burning building." | Courageous, fearless, heroic | Cowardly, timid |
| 7. Bright | Giving off or reflecting light | "The bright sunshine made the day feel happy." | Shining, radiant, luminous | Dim, dark |
| 8. Busy | Having a lot of work or activities | "I'm busy with work and can't take a vacation." | Occupied, engaged, active | Idle, lazy |
| 9. Calm | Peaceful and quiet | "The calm atmosphere in the park helped me relax." | Serene, tranquil, peaceful | Anxious, nervous |
| 10. Charming | Pleasing or attractive | "The charming smile of the actor won over the audience." | Delightful, captivating, enchanting | Unpleasant, unattractive |

### Exercise

Choose the correct adjective to complete each sentence:

1. The _______________________ view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
a) Beautiful
b) Boring
c) Bright
d) Busy

2. The _______________________ person is not afraid to speak their mind.
a) Adventurous
b) Ambitious
c) Brave
d) Calm

3. The _______________________ city was founded over 2,000 years ago.
a) Ancient
b) Modern
c) Beautiful
d) Busy

4. The _______________________ teacher made the lesson fun and engaging.
a) Boring
b) Brave
c) Charming
d) Busy

5. The _______________________ weather made it perfect for a picnic.
a) Bright
b) Calm
c) Busy
d) Beautiful

### Answer key

1. a) Beautiful
2. c) Brave
3. a) Ancient
4. c) Charming
5. b) Calm
